foreignData.name: Umklammerung der Unterstadt
foreignData.text: Ein Gegner deiner Wahl opfert eine Kreatur. Falls du eine Kreatur mit Stärke 4 oder mehr kontrollierst, erhältst du 4 Lebenspunkte dazu.

foreignData.name: Abrazo de la Subciudad
foreignData.text: El oponente objetivo sacrifica una criatura. Si controlas una criatura con fuerza de 4 o más, ganas 4 vidas.

foreignData.name: Étreinte de la Citerraine
foreignData.text: L'adversaire ciblé sacrifie une créature. Si vous contrôlez une créature avec une force supérieure ou égale à 4, vous gagnez 4 points de vie.

foreignData.flavorText: La città sepolta è sempre affamata.
foreignData.name: Abbraccio della Città Sepolta
foreignData.text: Un avversario bersaglio sacrifica una creatura. Se controlli una creatura con forza pari o superiore a 4, guadagni 4 punti vita.

foreignData.flavorText: 地底街はいつでも空腹だ。
foreignData.name: 地底街の抱擁
foreignData.text: 対戦相手１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはクリーチャー１体を生け贄に捧げる。あなたがパワーが４以上のクリーチャーをコントロールしているなら、あなたは４点のライフを得る。

foreignData.name: 지하 도시의 포옹
foreignData.text: 상대를 목표로 정한다. 그 상대는 생물 한 개를 희생한다. 당신이 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 조종한다면, 당신은 생명 4점을 얻는다.

foreignData.flavorText: O submundo está sempre com fome.
foreignData.name: Abraço do Submundo
foreignData.text: O oponente alvo sacrifica uma criatura. Se você controla uma criatura com poder igual ou superior a 4, você ganha 4 pontos de vida.

foreignData.name: Объятия Подземного Города
foreignData.text: Целевой оппонент жертвует существо. Если вы контролируете существо с силой 4 или больше, вы получаете 4 жизни.

foreignData.name: 地底城之拥
foreignData.text: 目标对手牺牲一个生物。如果你操控力量等于或大于4的生物，则你获得4点生命。

foreignData.name: 地底城之擁
foreignData.text: 目標對手犧牲一個生物。如果你操控力量等於或大於4的生物，則你獲得4點生命。

name: Undercity's Embrace
originalText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.

rulings.text: You can still gain 4 life even if the target opponent can’t sacrifice a creature.

Whether you control a creature with power 4 or greater is checked only after your opponent has sacrificed a creature. If a creature you own with power 4 or greater was exiled until the sacrificed creature left the battlefield, that creature will return to the battlefield before the check, so it will count. However, any abilities that trigger on the sacrificed creature’s death won’t have resolved yet when you check what creatures you control.
You gain only 4 life, even if you control more than one creature with power 4 or greater.

text: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. If you control a creature with power 4 or greater, you gain 4 life.
